com.plusauth.android.api.request

Interface AuthorizableRequest<T,U extends AuthenticationException>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type this request will return on success.
    U - the type this request will return on failure.
    All Superinterfaces:
    ParameterizableRequest<T,U>, Request<T,U>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseRequest, SimpleRequest

    public interface AuthorizableRequest<T,U extends AuthenticationException>
extends ParameterizableRequest<T,U>
    Interface for a OIDC requests that requires authorization.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AuthorizableRequest<T,U> setBearer(java.lang.String jwt)
      Set the JWT used in 'Authorization' header value

      • Methods inherited from interface com.plusauth.android.api.request.ParameterizableRequest

        addHeader, addParameter, addParameters, useUrlencodedBody

      • Methods inherited from interface com.plusauth.android.api.request.Request

        call, callSync

    • Method Detail

      • setBearer

        AuthorizableRequest<T,U> setBearer(java.lang.String jwt)
        Set the JWT used in 'Authorization' header value
        Parameters:
        jwt - token to send. Do not include the 'Bearer' keyword
        Returns:
        this
